item.title: Kony 2012
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:119, topic:435415”][quote author=Wet Dreamss link=topic=538134.msg3951747#msg3951747 date=1332350355]
All you people who still support Invisible children listen to this…

About 31% of the donations they receive ACTUALLY go to Uganda. What happens there is even funnier. They send the donations to the local Ugandan armies which will take their “share” of the money, which leaves about 3-9% for the actual children. With a yearly donation amount of around 8-10mil$. Even with money going to the Ugandan children, how does that help them hide from a man who is snatchin yo peoples up?
[/quote]
Exactly, silly unintelligent facebook sheep. Literally over 60 of my friends had that video shared without knowing the background of the ‘charity’ itself.

Out of all of those to talk about it on my news feed, ranger_squad’s was the only one with any sense of intelligence :P[/quote]
lol, people we’re calling me a hypocrite left and right because of what I was saying. like Ffffuuuuuu

Read full topic

item.title: Kony 2012
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“zuppers, post:106, topic:435415”][quote author=ziplock link=topic=538134.msg3944755#msg3944755 date=1331761771]

[quote author=zuppers link=topic=538134.msg3944741#msg3944741 date=1331760269]

[quote author=ziplock link=topic=538134.msg3944738#msg3944738 date=1331760007]

Even if he has retired, doesnt change his crimes you fucking assholes. If hitler would of retired would we of saw no reason to bring him to trial. Wow i mean some of you kids on here are truly the scum of this earth…

What about your presidents crimes

Wait wat? When has any US president ever kidnapped childreneverything standing in their way and forced them to murdered their family in order to live?

Doesn’t mean the president is an angel, but he is compared to kony.

Proof? I mean if you plan on making those allegations you might as well back them up.

Proof of Kony turning children on their parents please? One video full of false statistics, overexaggerated statements, led by a ‘charity’ organization that dose’t even have a third party auditor is not enough for me.
[/quote]What do you want? http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lord’s_Resistance_Army

Warrant of Arrest unsealed against five LRA Commanders

Did you even read what you posted? No where in there does it say or have proof that they turned the children on their parents. It says that they picked up orphans and in massive raids they captured the children instead of killing them. Nothing about turning the children against their parents. The second link did not work.
[/quote]Forcing children to participate in hostilities could very well mean killing their parents, why the hell are you focused on that matter anyway. The only proof your going to get is the word of the escaped children. Forcing children to participate in hostilities isn’t bad enough for you or something? Also link works fine for me.

Actually I don’t care about the situation at all. Africa is a horrible place. Although I’m just pointing out when someone makes a statement saying “NO PICS NO PROOF LULUL” and then they don’t have proof of their own views, then I have this unbearable urge to step in.
[/quote]I can relate to that. I do care about the situation however in middle school(feels like a long time ago) we watched the Invisible Children documentary, which is a lot worse than the 30 minute youtube video in terms of how shocking it was. I have no doubts that the LRA is guilty of the crimes they are charged with by the International Criminal Court. Joseph Kony is on a lot of most wanted list. I’d suggest everyone who’s interested read the Criticisms of Invisible Children Inc then decide if they want to support said organization. However regardless of whether or not they are just ‘in it’ for the money the removal the LRA is still a good cause to get behind.[/quote]

The only problem with removing the LRA is that there not in their prime anymore. They’re almost inactive now and there are other groups who are committing the same crimes such as General Butt Naked (Not even kidding), and the ULIMO. If the LRA is taken out then someone else will just most likely step up to take their place. As I said, Africa is a terrible place, and will probably take more strategic action than just going in there and stopping a worn out militia.

Read full topic

item.title: Kony 2012
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:105, topic:435415”][quote author=zuppers link=topic=538134.msg3944741#msg3944741 date=1331760269]

[quote author=ziplock link=topic=538134.msg3944738#msg3944738 date=1331760007]

Even if he has retired, doesnt change his crimes you fucking assholes. If hitler would of retired would we of saw no reason to bring him to trial. Wow i mean some of you kids on here are truly the scum of this earth…

What about your presidents crimes

Wait wat? When has any US president ever kidnapped childreneverything standing in their way and forced them to murdered their family in order to live?

Doesn’t mean the president is an angel, but he is compared to kony.

Proof? I mean if you plan on making those allegations you might as well back them up.

Proof of Kony turning children on their parents please? One video full of false statistics, overexaggerated statements, led by a ‘charity’ organization that dose’t even have a third party auditor is not enough for me.
[/quote]What do you want? http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lord’s_Resistance_Army

Warrant of Arrest unsealed against five LRA Commanders

Did you even read what you posted? No where in there does it say or have proof that they turned the children on their parents. It says that they picked up orphans and in massive raids they captured the children instead of killing them. Nothing about turning the children against their parents. The second link did not work.
[/quote]Forcing children to participate in hostilities could very well mean killing their parents, why the hell are you focused on that matter anyway. The only proof your going to get is the word of the escaped children. Forcing children to participate in hostilities isn’t bad enough for you or something? Also link works fine for me.

Actually I don’t care about the situation at all. Africa is a horrible place. Although I’m just pointing out when someone makes a statement saying “NO PICS NO PROOF LULUL” and then they don’t have proof of their own views, then I have this unbearable urge to step in.[/quote]I can relate to that. I do care about the situation however in middle school(feels like a long time ago) we watched the Invisible Children documentary, which is a lot worse than the 30 minute youtube video in terms of how shocking it was. I have no doubts that the LRA is guilty of the crimes they are charged with by the International Criminal Court. Joseph Kony is on a lot of most wanted list. I’d suggest everyone who’s interested read the Criticisms of Invisible Children Inc then decide if they want to support said organization. However regardless of whether or not they are just ‘in it’ for the money the removal the LRA is still a good cause to get behind.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

What about your presidents crimes

Wait wat? When has any US president ever kidnapped childreneverything standing in their way and forced them to murdered their family in order to live?

Doesn’t mean the president is an angel, but he is compared to kony.

Proof of Kony turning children on their parents please? One video full of false statistics, overexaggerated statements, led by a ‘charity’ organization that dose’t even have a third party auditor is not enough for me.

Did you even read what you posted? No where in there does it say or have proof that they turned the children on their parents. It says that they picked up orphans and in massive raids they captured the children instead of killing them. Nothing about turning the children against their parents. The second link did not work.
[/quote]Forcing children to participate in hostilities could very well mean killing their parents, why the hell are you focused on that matter anyway. The only proof your going to get is the word of the escaped children. Forcing children to participate in hostilities isn’t bad enough for you or something? Also link works fine for me.[/quote]

Actually I don’t care about the situation at all. Africa is a horrible place. Although I’m just pointing out when someone makes a statement saying “NO PICS NO PROOF LULUL” and then they don’t have proof of their own views, then I have this unbearable urge to step in.
